name: 2D Space Shooter (kamyasuraj)
description:
Three significant modifications

1) Design Modifications

  • Each level has a different play area structure.
  • Full play structure is visible in mini-map.  

2) Aesthetic modifications

  • Main background is modified
  • All menus and backgrounds are changed.
  • All buttons and panel have new sprites.
  • All levels have new designs and backgrounds along with different music

3) Gameplay Modifications

  • Mini-Map is added (Bottom-Left)
  • Life Status (Bottom-Right)
  • Number of Enemies Left (Top-Right)
  • Each level has a boss with increased health, fire rate and projectile type.
